fields.description: The configuration settings that determines the validation flow of users using  Service Authentication/Authorization.
fields.name: GlobalValidation

fields.description: The configuration settings of the HTTP requests for authentication and authorization requests made against ContainerApp Service Authentication/Authorization.
fields.name: HTTPSettings

fields.description: The configuration settings of each of the identity providers used to configure ContainerApp Service Authentication/Authorization.
fields.name: IdentityProviders

fields.description: The configuration settings of the login flow of users using ContainerApp Service Authentication/Authorization.
fields.name: Login

fields.description: The configuration settings of the platform of ContainerApp Service Authentication/Authorization.
fields.name: Platform
